name: SEER Regional Nodes
title: SEER Regional Nodes
notes:
**Note 1:**  For this site, code ALL lymph node involvement in this field.

**Note 2:**  When coding Regional Nodes Positive and Regional Nodes Examined, only include regional nodes. Do not include distant nodes coded in SEER Mets.
rows: No clinical adenopathy and either pathologically negative or no pathologic statement

Lymph node(s) involved only

Both clinically enlarged palpable lymph node(s) (adenopathy) and pathologically positive
lymph nodes

Clinically enlarged palpable lymph node(s) (adenopathy), and either pathologically
negative nodes or no pathological statement

No clinically enlarged palpable lymph nodes(s) (adenopathy) but pathologically positive
lymph node(s)

Lymph node(s), NOS

Unknown; not stated
Regional lymph node(s) cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record
